item.title: Home 38
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="home_38" slidertitle="home 38"][/rev_slider]

1080P full HD resolution

Full HD resolution retaining true colors

Auto-focusing

Auto-focusing on startup

Dolby Audio

Customized acoustics tuning

Android TV 9.0

Diverse content and multiple apps to choose from

Google Assistant

Smart voice control connecting smart devices

Projection Size

Nulla Lorem mollit cupidatat irure. Laborum magna nulla duis ullamco cillum dolor. “Love the little projector, easy to use, great images and color. This device is amazing” Dewayne Verified Purchase “I’m very satisfied with the quality of the picture and brightness - works pretty well ” Ivan McGray Verified Purchase “Our family past time used to be going to the movie theater, due to this virus.” John petter Verified Purchase

What’s in the Box

  • Fabric carrying case
  • USB-A to USB-C cable, 1.25 m
  • 3.5 mm audio cable, 1.25 m
